description: Seven people have been arrested following the death of 22-year-old Taylor Green.
title: Burglary charge as Tuxford murder investigation continues
title_page: Burglary charge as Tuxford murder investigation continues - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been charged with aggravated burglary by detectives working on an ongoing murder investigation.
Police were called to Lodge Lane in Tuxford, Nottinghamshire, on 25 February and found Taylor Green, 22, unresponsive outside a property.
He died a short time later and a murder investigation was launched, which has since led to the arrests of seven people.
A Nottinghamshire Police spokesperson said Mason Meanwell, 24, of Byron Close, Newark, had been charged with aggravated burglary in relation to the incident.
He was due to appear at Nottingham Magistrates' Court on Wednesday.
Two men, aged 26 and 43, who were arrested on suspicion of aggravated burglary and two women, aged 23 and 24, arrested on suspicion of assisting an offender, have been released on conditional bail while police continue inquiries.
A 24-year-old man arrested on 25 February on suspicion of Mr Green's murder was also released on conditional police bail, while a 21-year-old woman arrested on suspicion of murder has been released without charge.
